name.baseName: Basin simulation ; Marine carbonate rocks 6000-10000m ; Dynamic simulation technology
盆地模拟; 海相碳酸盐岩6000-10000m; 动力学模拟技术

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: In view of the complex reservoir-forming characteristics of the Cambrian ultra-deep petroleum system in Tarim Basin, the evolution process of "source-circle-reservoir" of Cambrian is discussed by using dynamic simulation technology, and the evolution history of "generation-migration-accumulation-adjustment" of oil and gas in the ultra-deep petroleum system is revealed
针对塔里木盆地寒武系超深层含油气系统复杂的成藏特征，采用动力学模拟技术探讨了寒武系“源－圈－藏”的 演 化 过 程，揭 示 了超深层含油气系统油气“生 成 －运 移 －聚 集 －调 整 ”的 演 化 历 史

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The reservoir-forming dynamics simulation of ultra-deep petroleum system in Bachu uplift and Tabei uplift in platform basin area is carried out, and the channel and direction of oil and gas filling and migration in each period are restricted by setting the time of typical profile geological conditions.
对台盆区巴楚隆起和塔 北隆起的超深层含油气系统开展成藏动力学模拟，通 过对典型剖面地质条件进行时间设定，来约束各时期油气充注和运移的通道和方向。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The dynamic simulation technology described is used for geoscientific analysis in the Tarim Basin's Cambrian ultra-deep petroleum system. It is specifically applied to understand the complex characteristics of oil and gas generation, migration, accumulation, and adjustment in source-circle-reservoir systems at depths of 6000-10000 meters in marine carbonate rocks. The intent is to provide a basis for future exploration and exploitation of ultra-deep oil and gas resources by simulating the thermal evolution, generation, and migratory behavior of hydrocarbons in different geological profiles.
所述动力学模拟技术用于塔里木盆地寒武系超深层含油气系统的地质科学分析。该技术专门用于理解6000-10000米海相碳酸盐岩中“源-圈-藏”系统油气生成、迁移、聚集及调整的复杂特性。其目的是通过模拟不同地质剖面的烃源岩热演化、生成和迁移行为，为未来超深层油气资源的勘探开发提供依据。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The thermal evolution history, hydrocarbon generation history and migration and accumulation history of Cambrian ultra-deep "source-circle-reservoir" system in Tarim Basin are analyzed by using basin simulation technique. Combined with the fluid streamline simulation results at critical moments, the hydrocarbon filling process of Cambrian ultra-deep petroleum system is discussed in order to provide relevant basis for ultra-deep oil and gas exploration in Tarim Basin
采用盆地模拟技术对塔里木盆地寒武 系超深层 “源－圈－藏”系 统 重 点开展了热演化史 、生 烃史和运聚史分析 ，并 结合关键时刻流体的流线模拟结 果，探讨了寒武系超深层含油气系统的油气充注过程，以期为塔里木盆地超深层油气勘探提供相关依据
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: The overall maturity of source rocks in Tabei slope belt, Shuntuoguole low uplift and Maigaiti slope belt is less than 2%, which is in a high maturity stage and still has good hydrocarbon generation potential at present
塔北斜坡带、顺托果勒低隆起和麦盖提斜坡带烃源岩的整体成熟度低于２％ ，处于高成熟阶段，目前仍然具有较好的生烃潜力

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 李斌;张欣;郭强;吕海涛;杨素举;徐勤琪;彭军; 塔里木盆地寒武系超深层含油气系统盆地模拟. 石油学报 804–815 (2022).
李斌;张欣;郭强;吕海涛;杨素举;徐勤琪;彭军; 塔里木盆地寒武系超深层含油气系统盆地模拟. 石油学报 804–815 (2022).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this data set for life cycle assessment or related geological and industrial applications, ensure that the data is applicable to the specific geological context of interest. Considerations should be made for the depth and geological conditions of the marine carbonate rock formations. The methodology and results should appropriately capture the complex interactions and evolutionary history of hydrocarbon systems within the Cambrian ultra-deep source-circle-reservoirs. Caution must be taken when extrapolating findings to different basins or formations without adequate similarity in characteristics. Users should integrate results with fluid streamline simulation outcomes to enhance the accuracy and relevance of predictive exploration models.
在使用此数据集进行生命周期评估或相关地质和工业应用时，确保数据适用于感兴趣的特定地质环境。需要考虑海相碳酸盐岩层的深度和地质条件。方法和结果应正确反映寒武系超深层“源-圈-藏”油气系统内复杂的相互作用和演化历史。在特征相似性不足的情况下，小心推广至不同的盆地或地层可能不准确。用户应将结果与流体流线模拟成果结合，以提高预测勘探模型的准确性和相关性。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: Natural gas production of Wusonger Formation (6597~6835m)
吾松格尔组 （6597～6835ｍ）的 天 然 气 产 量
